title: Open Channel Management - OpenChannelCurve
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic curve made for Raw-Water (Open Channels) System Management domain.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be OpenChannelCurve

curveType.description: Property. Type of curve for spillways and regulation structures. It can be a curve representing: 1) the discharge coefficient (C) as a function of relative weir opening (a/H, a: sluice-gate opening, H: upstream head), 2) the discharge (Q) as a function of the water elevation (H), 3) the design discharge coefficient (Co) as a function of P/Ho, where P is the apron elevation of the OGEE spillway and Ho the design upstrean head, 4) discharge coefficient (C) as a function of H/L, where H is the upstream head and L the legnth of a BROAD-CRESTED spillway, 5) the function C/Co - H/Ho. Enum:'C - a/H, H - Q, Co - P/Ho, C â€“ H/L, C/Co - H/Ho'

xData.description: Property. X data points for the curve.

yData.description: Property. Y data points for the curve.
